page.description: If the field is indexed, return the tagname, else return an empty string.
page.discussion: The .TAG_GET() method returns the Index_Expression for the field, if it is indexed.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example shows that the Product_Id field is indexed on its value.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim fld as P tbl = table.open("invoice.set") fld = tbl.field_get("INVOICE_ITEMS->PRODUCT_ID") ? fld.tag_get() = "Product_Id"
